Text:
One day, Cid brandishes his sword alone in the
forest.

(Lately, it's all been actual combat. But as
someone aiming to be a shadowbroker,
I can't afford to skimp on my training.)

(Sure, I could take up Zen, waterfall meditation,
mindfulness, fasting, yoga... Not that there's
anything wrong with any of those.)

(But what matters more is regularly sticking to the
plain old classic training.)

...Still, something's missing. It's not about how
much I'm training. It's more internal...

Imagine facing an ultra-tough opponent or suddenly
feeling like my power had been reset... Some sort of
thrilling twistâ€”
...Boss man?
Wait, Delta? It's been a whileâ€”
Bossss maaaan!!!

As Delta rushes toward him, Cid recalls a memory from
his past.

(I thought it looked familiar. That truck that hit
me... Why am I thinking of it now...?)

(Right, this might be a good opportunity.
It's important to return to one's roots.)
There, there, Delta! Come hereâ€”
Whaaaat?!

Delta's fierce charge sends Cid's body flying through
the air.
Guargh!

Then, he intentionally slams his head against a
sizable rock on the ground.

Boss! Hey, boss! Long time no see! I'm here to report
on my missionâ€”
...Huh? Boss man?

(Whoa... I can feel my consciousness...slipping
away...)
Boss man? What's wrong? Boss man?! BOSS MAAAAAN!
Mmm...

Cid wakes up. He's greeted by the concerned
expressions of seven individuals...
Thank goodness. You're awake.

How's the pain? I've been cooling the injured area,
but let me know if you start feeling dizzy or
nauseous.

Let me know if you feel even the slightest
discomfort. I'll take care of you, both
physically and emotionally!

Boss man! Sorry! It's my fault for bumping into
you! I was just so eager to see you!
That's the problem with dogs. No self-control.
Hey, kitty cat! Did you just mock me?!
...Master? Why isn't he reacting...?

Is everything okay? Are you still feeling
disoriented...?
Where am I?

Where...? This is the ancient city of Alexandria.
Our base, remember, Cid?
I'm...Cid?
Yes, you are... Seriously, what's the matter?
Who are all of you?
Huh?

I'm guessing we're pretty close. I mean, you all seem
worried about me.
But, sorry. I don't remember.
No way...! You're joking, right?!
I-It's not funny...
Wait, are you being serious...?
Sorry...
You mean, you have...amnesia?!
"Am-a-neeja"? What's that?

It means he's forgotten...about us...and, based on
what he's said, where he is...and everything else.

Whaaaatt?! I don't want that!! Boss man, remember me!
It's Delta! DELLLTA!!!
Delta, calm down.
Ha-ruff...
Ah...um, sorry. I didn't mean to bring the mood down.
Please don't apologize. It's not your fault!

If you've forgotten...we'll just make you remember.
Simple.

We can help by talking to you about everything. About
us, about the Shadow Gardenâ€”something might spark
your memory!
Should we start now? Or give it some time?

Right. We shouldn't rush him. Are you feeling anxious
about having lost your memory, Master Shaâ€”
Beta.

The atmosphere grows tense as Alpha utters a single
word.
Cid, you really don't remember anything?
Huh? Yeah, I don't.

In that case, until your memory returns, there isn't
much we can tell you.
Lady Alpha...?
Also, we'll have to restrict your movements.

Of course, we'll make sure you're treated well and
properly cared for. But until your memory returns,
you'll remain under our watch.
W-Wait, hold on! Why do we need toâ€”
To prevent intel leaks?
Huh? What do you mean?
...Zeta, please escort him to his room.
Understood. Come, let's go.
...Yeah, sure...

As Zeta leads Cid away, Alpha's gaze sweeps over the
remaining members of the Seven Shadows.
I didn't want to do this either. Butâ€”

Cid has forgotten that he's Shadow and that our
organization is the Shadow Garden. Of course, this
also means he's forgotten that the true identity of
Shadow is top-secret.

We'll take turns looking after him. This stays a
secret within the Seven Shadows. Agreed?

Everyone nods solemnly in response to Alpha's
instructions,

even as they conceal their individual thoughts and
intentions...
